text: Northland is the best school as it is one of the top rated school. I am P4 right now and still enjoying school

northland is the best school i am P4 graduating to P5 the teachers were so kind especially Mdm Chen Jun who is my mother tongue teacher. i have improved a lot in my math EYE thanks to Mrs Shiamala i was able to score AL3 for Math in was so happy

You all shld join this school but got 1 or 2  teachers that r toooooooooo strict and racist(not gonna mention names) for example, got one math teacher racist to me and my other Malay and Indian friends. We keep getting targetted by her but towards the Chinese, she very good. Rarely scold them. She also like to take sides. If u ever encounter my teacher, just know u need to study extra harder. Her teaching just not teachinging. But other than that, it's a VERY good school. I recommend all parents to enrol their kid here.
Hello , iam a student from nothland iam p3 and the school is very strect like miss gan  she is very strect like people who do not listen to her

Im graduating this year and I would say that I have learned a lot in Northland and also I am always proud to be a Northlander.
Also credits to my teachers teaching us so hard especially this year 2020 with covid , the teachers still helped us whatever they can .
Now after PSLE , im already excited for the time really enjoying the Northland area the last few times without stress.
So if any parents want to send their kid to this school and is wondering if you should? My answer is YES.
